WorkflowInfo.Name: Send Office365 email to a list of email addresses
WorkflowInfo.Description: Send Office365 email to a list of email addresses
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" x:Name="CustomWorkflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><CreateMemoryTable x:Name="createMemoryTable1" activityLicenseType="1" id="291" name="CreateMemoryTable" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" ColumnNumber="1" TableName="UsersEmailList" RowNumber="5" isEmptyGrid="0" Description="Creates a table and saves it to the workflow memory" DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet> <xs:schema id='NewDataSet' xmlns='' xmlns:xs='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema' xmlns:msdata='urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata'> <xs:element name='NewDataSet' msdata:IsDataSet='true' msdata:MainDataTable='resultSet' msdata:UseCurrentLocale='true'> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice minOccurs='0' maxOccurs='unbounded'> <xs:element name='resultSet'> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name='Column1' type='xs:string' minOccurs='0' /> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> <resultSet><Column1>Jonny@xyz.com</Column1></resultSet><resultSet><Column1>Mike@xyz.com</Column1></resultSet><resultSet><Column1>Danny@xyz.com</Column1></resultSet><resultSet><Column1>Ed@xyz.com</Column1></resultSet><resultSet><Column1>Shane@xyz.com</Column1></resultSet> </NewDataSet>" label="Create Memory Table" description="Creates a memory table." notes="" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" /><GetRowsCount x:Name="getRowsCount1" activityLicenseType="1" id="287" name="GetRowsCount" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" ResultSet="%UsersEmailList%" ResultSetName="UsersEmailList" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." DisplayName="Get Rows Count" TypeName="GetRowsCount" label="Get Rows Count" description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." notes="" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" activityLicenseType="1" id="432" name="WhileActivity" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" Condition="{x:Null}" label="WhileActivity" notes=""><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"><ExitWhile DisplayName="Exit While" Description="Exit current while activity" IsValid="True" TypeName="ExitWhile" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" whileSequenceActivity="sequenceActivity1" name="ExitWhile" x:Name="exitWhile1" /><GetCellValue x:Name="GetCellValue1" activityLicenseType="1" id="276" name="GetCellValue" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%UsersEmailList%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="UsersEmailList" Description="Retrieves a cell's value according to its location in a table" DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" label="Get Cell Value" description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." notes="" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" ColumnType="Number" /><OfficeSendMail x:Name="officeSendMail1" activityLicenseType="2" id="621" name="OfficeSendMail" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="OfficeSendMail" Description="Send an email on behalf of a Office365 user" subject="This is a test mail" fromEmail="FROM_EMAIL" toEmail="%GetCellValue1%" messageBody="This is a test mail" appId="APPLICATION_ID" tenantId="TENANT_ID" secret="SECRET" TypeName="OfficeSendMail" label="OfficeSendMail" description="Send an email on behalf of a Office365 user" notes="" /></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
